fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
~ Careful Setup (3-shot): Set up a trap in a playerâ€™s home. It will go off if the target takes an action of your choice during the night (within reason), ie visits a player, is visited, uses an investigative ability, etc. When triggered, it will deal a Powerful attack to the target. This does not use the factional kill.
~ Suffocate (2-shot): Target a player during the night. If they are not visited by anyone else, they will be hit with a Powerful attack. This does not use the factional kill.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
~ You can multitask up to 2 abilities during the night.
~ If you die during the night, target a player. You will hit them with a Powerful attack.
